remarks: Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifiers (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2006.)  (Revised by Szymon Jaroszewicz, 16-Mar-2007.)
statement:
2ralbidv.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2ralbidv $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ps <-> A. x e. A A. y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph y $.
